The Post-Destruction World

altTitles.vi: Thế Giới sau ngày Diệt Vong

description.en:
Faced with imminent defeat and certain death, would you choose to run – or continue to fight for a doomed world?

When mysterious towers appear across the world, summoning monsters that prey on mankind, this is the choice presented to the Tower Walkers – adventurers with special powers to fight the monsters.

On the brink of death, they can choose to use a “regression stone” to return to the past for a second chance, though this decision places them in a separate timeline forever.

Stubborn Tower Walker Jaehwan rejects this choice, choosing to fight for the original timeline, and learning shocking secrets about the Tower along the way.
description.ko:
<전지적 독자 시점> 싱숑 작가 원작.

이것은 모두가 과거로 돌아갈 때 마지막까지 회귀하지 않았던 한 사나이의 이야기다.
description.pt-br: Esta é a história de um homem que não voltou quando todos retornaram ao passado. Os humanos foram convocados de repente para se tornarem “Andarilhos” e precisavam limpar a torre para salvar o mundo… 77º Andar: A Pedra do Retorno foi descoberta. Andarilhos podiam agora retornar ao passado. Lentamente, todos foram embora… A última esperança da humanidade, “Carpe Diem”, foi formada com as pessoas que se recusaram a abandonar o mundo… O último Andarilho chegou ao 100º andar. Ele não sabia mais no que crer. Obs.: Essa é a adaptação da novel que existe dentro da novel/manhwa Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint e que o protagonista lê em sua juventude.

description.en: Alphas lust for Omegas, and Omegas want Alphas. That’s the way of the world, but Karlyle isn’t your typical Alpha. He doesn’t thirst after every Omega he sees—well, let’s say that things are complicated. Karlyle feels no need to change, but when troubles occur with his sex life his doctor suggests something surprising. Try sleeping with Alphas, instead of Omegas. Karlyle finds this solution strange, but the doctor says he knows just the person to help him out. Ash comes into Karlyle’s life just like that, and Karlyle finds himself thinking about Ash more and more. More than friends, but not quite lovers—how can we define this relationship?

altTitles.en: The Devilish Ring
The Ring of Evil
Devilish Ring
Evil Ring

description.en: 18 years ago, a prophecy emerged that a boy with a black ring, deemed inferior, would rewrite the survival rules of the world of the gifted. The only remaining descendant of the “Divine-Tier” status, Shannon, wears a black ring and lives as an inferior being in the filthy exile zone. However, his peaceful life is shattered when his identity is exposed, and the top-tier forces, seeing him as a threat, send out an assassination squad to kill Shannon. Five gifted individuals, who have existed since childhood to protect Shannon, are summoned at the same time. They rush to the exile zone to protect the last descendant of the “Divine-Tier” status, and a battle among the “rings” is about to ignite!

description.en:
Ha-ri made a deal—go on one blind date for her BFF and pretend to be a super-vixen to end all of her unwanted marriage set-ups! Unfortunately, instead of easy money, Ha-ri’s got a headache. Her date is Taemu, her company’s hot new CEO, and he’s got his own plans to get his family to back off by marrying whoever shows up on the date. Should Ha-ri accept his proposal to keep playing pretend? Nothing could go wrong with lying about your real identity while dating the boss... right??

description.fr:
Son amie, une héritière pleine aux as, lui demande de se rendre à un rendez-vous arrangé à sa place. Objectif? Faire fuir le prétendant coûte que coûte! Mais elle ne se doutait pas que ledit prétendant s'avère être son patron, et encore moins que ce cinglé la demande en mariage sans raison et dès la première rencontre! Commence alors un véritable vaudeville hilarant à la sauce coréenne.

Shin Ha Ri seorang karyawan swasta yang hidup serba pas-pasan menggantikan temannya yang tidak ingin menghadiri perjodohan demi mendapatkan uang tambahan. Siapa sangka orang yang ia temui di perjodohan itu adalah direktur baru di kantornya yang terkenal galak dan kejam. Bagaimanakah nasib Shin Ha Ri selanjutnya?

description.en:
Suzuki Saburo is the typical isekai MC. A high school boy who started to get into cooking after getting an injury during baseball, he suddenly found himself in another world one day. With the only thing on his person being his custom knife, he wandered a desolate prairie for three days before falling unconscious.   
  
When he woke up, he found that a nomadic tribe of elves took him in. However, there’s one big problem - the tribe has terrible cooking. Can Saburo help teach the nomadic elves the true meaning of deliciousness?  

---

description.en: The student Nakatani Yuto was supposed to be having a regular life, however his whole class was transferred to another world. All the students gained powerful skills and were worshipped as heroes, but for Yuto who got the unfavorable skill [Absorption]...! ?
description.ja: 高校生の中谷夕斗は突然クラスメイトと共に異世界へ「勇者」として召喚されてしまう。クラスメイト達が強力な技能（スキル）を授かるなか、ユウトが授かったのは不遇スキル【吸】であった。 使い物にならないユウトは魔物との戦闘で致命傷を負うが、クラスメイトは彼を見殺しに…。その瞬間、ユウトにはどこからともなく“声”が聞こえて――…!?

altTitles.en: Masamune-kun's Revenge: Engagement

altTitles.ja: 政宗くんのリベンジ -engagement-

description.en:
It's been one year after Makabe Masamune and Adagaki Aki got together, and they're temporarily on a long-distance relationship when Aki moved to Sapporo to attend university. Koiwai Yoshino, who continued living at Aki's house, finally got accepted into Juntama University after failing their entrance exam last year, and she reunited with Makabe, now a second year student here. However, trouble immediately started when they got dragged into a game by the new freshman Kyogoku Iroha, and she claimed Makabe, who inadvertently "won" the game, as her "lover" against his will...

NOTE: This title has its own page on Ichijin+ and chapter counts are following Ichijin+'s order, not the volume release.

title.en: I'm in Love with the Villainess

altTitles.ja: 私の推しは悪役令嬢。

altTitles.zh: 我的首推是恶役大小姐

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的首推是惡役大小姐

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shǒutuī shì è yì dà xiǎojiě

altTitles.th: ทำไงดีเกมนี้นางร้ายน่ารัก

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Oshi wa Akuyaku Reijou.

altTitles.en: I Favor the Villainess

altTitles.ja-ro: WataOshi

altTitles.es-la: Mi Oshi Es Una Villa Noble

description.de:
Oohashi Rei - eigentlich eine ganz normale Büroangestellte - wacht eines Tages im Körper der Protagonistin ihres absoluten Lieblingsspiels "Revolution" auf. Eigentlich geht es in dem Spiel darum, mit einem von drei absolut wundervollen Prinzen zusammenzukommen. Ein klassisches Otome-Game, und wenn es nach Rei geht, auch das mit Abstand beste.  
Ihr Hauptinteresse lag dabei jedoch nicht etwa an einem der männlichen Charaktere, sondern an Claire François, der Antagonistin des Spiels.

Wird Rei es schaffen, eine romantische Beziehung zu ihr aufzubauen? Wie werden die eigentlichen Stars des Spiels, die drei Prinzen, auf diese Situation reagieren?  
Und was hält Claire überhaupt davon?
description.en:
Ordinary office worker Oohashi Rei wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favourite otome game, *Revolution*. To her delight, the first person to greet her is also her favourite character, Claire François – the main antagonist of the story!

Now, Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game’s male leads. But how will her villainous lady love react to this new courtship?!
description.fr:
Rei Ôhashi, une simple employée de bureau d’une petite entreprise, se retrouve soudainement dans le corps de l’héroïne de son jeu vidéo de drague préféré, Revolution.
Maintenant sous le nom de Rae Taylor, elle est prête à accomplir son objectif.
Passer du bon temps avec les princes du jeu ? Non.
Son cœur appartient à la méchante de l’histoire, Claire François.
Bien décidée à la chérir et à rester à ses côtés, sa nouvelle vie commence dans un monde empreint de magie !
description.id: Seorang pegawai kantor biasa, Oohashi Rei, bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang Heroine bernama Rei Taylor di Game Otome favoritnya, "Revolution". Kebetulan lagi, orang pertama yang menyambutnya adalah karakter favoritnya, Claire Francois- antagonis dari cerita ini! Kini Rei bertekad untuk membangun hubungan romantis dengan Claire, bukan dengan pemeran utama pria. Lantas, bagaimanakah gadis jahat yang dia cintai akan bereaksi terhadap kemesraan baru ini?!
description.it:
La normale impiegata Oohashi Rei si sveglia nel corpo della protagonista del suo gioco otome preferito, Revolution. Per la sua gioia, la prima persona che incontra è anche il suo personaggio preferito, Claire François, l'antagonista principale della storia! Ora Rei è determinata a perseguire una storia d'amore con Claire piuttosto che con gli interessi amorosi maschili. Ma come reagirà la sua amata antagonista a questo nuovo corteggiamento?!
L'anime debutterà ad ottobre 2023!
Annunciato il manga ufficiale italiano!
description.ja: 乙女ゲーム『Revolution』の世界に、ヒロインのレイ＝テイラーとして転生した社畜OL・大橋零。そんな彼女の推しは攻略対象の王子たち…ではなく、悪役令嬢・クレア＝フランソワだった!　前世でゲームをやりこんでいたレイは、その知識と愛で、クレアとお近づきになることができるのか？
description.es-la: Oohashi Rei, una trabajadora de oficina ordinaria se despierta en el cuerpo de la protagonista de su juego otome favorito, "Revolution". Para su deleite, la primera persona en saludarla es también su personaje favorito, Claire Francois, ¡la principal antagonista de la historia! Ahora, Rei está decidida a enamorarse de Claire en lugar de los protagonistas masculinos del juego. ¿Pero cómo reaccionará la villana ante este nuevo cortejo?

altTitles.pt-br: O Dilema de um Arquidemônio: Como Amar sua Noiva Elfa

altTitles.es: Soy un Rey Demonio y he Tomado Como Esposa a una Elfa Esclava, ¿Cómo Puedo Amarla?

altTitles.es-la: Soy un Rey Demonio y he Tomado Como Esposa a una Elfa Esclava, ¿Cómo Puedo Amarla?

altTitles.en: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride

description.en: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
description.es: Zagan es temido como un mago malvado, es torpe y tiene una lengua afilada, y una vez más tuvo que acabar con unos ladrones que invadieron su territorio cuando estaba investigando esa mañana. En una oscura subasta, encuentra a una esclava elfa blanca, Nephie, que posee una belleza sin igual. Enamorado de ella a primera vista, utiliza su fortuna para comprarla, pero tan pobre como es socialmente, no entiende cómo relacionarse con ella. Así comienza la torpe convivencia del mago que no sabe transmitir su amor y la esclava que suspira por su amo pero no sabe cómo planteárselo.
description.fr:
Zagan est craint comme mage démoniaque, un jour au marché noir il rencontre une esclave elfe du nom de Nephie. De part sa beauté innocente, il tombe sous son charme et décide de l'acheter. Bien que fortuné d'argent, ses compétences sociales ne le sont pas et il a du mal à savoir comment créer une relation…  
  
C'est parti pour une cohabitation maladroite entre ce maître qui ne sait montrer son amour et cette esclave qui en pince pour lui sans savoir quoi faire.
description.pt: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.

title.en: Sleepy Princess in the Demon Castle

altTitles.ja: 魔王城でおやすみ

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou-jou de Oyasumi

altTitles.pt-br: A Princesa Sonolenta no Castelo Demoníaco

description.en: Sshhh! Princess Syalis is trying to get a good night's sleep. Some shut-eye. Forty winks. Catch some Z's. Long ago in olden times when people and demons lived together in—well, disharmony, really—a demon king kidnaps a human princess and imprisons her in his castle. Bereft, the princess's subjects beat their chests in anguish…until a hero arises to spearhead Project Rescue Our Princess! While waiting for her knight in shining armor, what's an imprisoned princess to do…? Teddy-bear guards with bat wings are all very well, but her dungeon cell is bo-o-o-ring! So, she decides to wile away the long hours by sleeping. Now if only she could get comfortable…and didn't suffer from insomnia…
description.ja:
かつて、人と魔が存在していた時代… 魔王は人間の姫をさらい、自らの城に幽閉した。人々は怒り、勇者は姫を救うために旅立つ！！そんな中、檻の中で姫は想う…「寝る以外、する事ない」

安眠する方法を探すため、囚われの姫が魔王城で好き勝手！
description.ru: В некотором царстве, в некотором государстве, принцессу поймал король демонов! Всё королевство было в шоке! Но потом, в шоке оказался сам демон...
description.pt-br: Há muito tempo, numa era em que os humanos viviam junto aos demônios, o Rei Demônio trouxe o caos ao reino dos humanos sequestrando a sua adorada princesa. Agora a princesa está desesperada e clamando por seu resgate… ou isso era o que pensa o povo do reino humano, pois a única preocupação da princesa é ter um soninho confortável.

altTitles.en: Dear Summer Sky

description.ar: بايك قيهو الذي يحب السماء أكثر من الناس، لذا كل ما تلتقطه كاميراته هو السماء. في أحد أيام الصيف، تنتقل فتاة تدعى "هانيول" والذي يعني اسمها "سماء" إلى صف قيهو لتجلس بجانبه.
description.en: Baek Gihu, who loves the sky more than people, takes pictures of the sky with his camera. One summer day, a girl named "Haneul"—her name means "Sky"—transfers to his class and sits in the seat next to him.

altTitles.ja: 魔王が田舎に嫁いだら

altTitles.en: If a Demon Lord Were to Get Married in the Countryside

description.en: A girl who calls herself the Demon Lord falls upon the main character, an elementary school teacher living in the countryside, and they decide to get married?!
description.ja: 田舎に住む小学校教師の主人公のもとに、魔王と名乗る少女が降ってきて結婚することに!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Mannen D-rank no Chuunen Boukensha, Yotta Ikioi de Densetsu no Ken wo Hikkonuku

altTitles.ja: 万年Dランクの中年冒険者、酔った勢いで伝説の剣を引っこ抜く

altTitles.en: Eternal D-Ranked Middle-aged Adventurer, Pulls Out the Legendary Sword While Drunk.

description.en: Lucas has a hard life. In his mid-thirties, a mixture of failures has left him old and crippled, playing pack mule to a couple of young adventures. Then one day, he pulls a magic sword from a stone that tells him he has been chosen to become a hero. Given a youthful form, Lucas must use the power of the sword to vanquish evil and attain a massive harem.
description.pt-br: O aventureiro de meia-idade, Lucas, passa seus dias com jovens aventureiros enquanto eles o tratam como um burro de carga. Mas enquanto ele estava bêbado, ele foi capaz de tirar a espada lendária de uma rocha que ninguém jamais foi capaz de fazer. Com o poder da espada lendária que a deusa da vitória e do amor criaram, o velho agora viaja seu caminho como o herói (sem querer) enquanto cria um harém. Antes de perguntar, não é isekai porque ele está neste mundo desde o primeiro dia.

altTitles.ja: 魔女の旅々

altTitles.ja-ro: Majo no Tabitabi
Majo no Tabitabi: The Journey of Elaina

altTitles.en: Wandering Witch
The Journey of Elaina
Wandering Witch: The Journey of Elaina

altTitles.th: การเดินทางของคุณแม่มด

description.en:
Once upon a time, there was a witch named Elaina, who set off on a journey across the world. Along the way, she would meet all kinds of people, from a country full of witches to a giant in love with his own muscles—but with each meeting, Elaina would become a small part of their story, and her own world would get a little bit bigger.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Akasha as **The Journey of Elaina** (2022)
description.id: Melakukan perjalanan tanpa henti, bertemu berbagai macam orang dari berbagai macam negara, serta mengembara demi memenuhi rasa ingin tahu. Inilah kisah pertemuan dan perpisahan penyihir kelabu Elaina.
description.ja: あるところに一人の魔女がいました。名前はイレイナ。彼女は旅人として、これといった目的もなく、色々な国や人と出逢いながら、流されるように気ままな長い旅を続けています。これは、そんな魔女イレイナが紡ぐ、出逢いと別れの物語…。
description.ru: Много лет странствующая ведьма Элейна находится в пути. Неустанно она путешествует по миру, чтобы повидать разные страны, удивительные обычаи и разносторонние проявления человеческой натуры. Сколько историй она может рассказать как их живой свидетель. Давайте же и мы поспешим составить ей компанию!

15 Minutes 'Til They Actually Start Dating
15 Minutes Before We Seriously Go Out

description.en: Growing up in the same apartment complex, Yuuki and Natsuha have known each other forever. They’ve been friends for so long that everyone just assumes they’re a couple! But as they both approach the final stretch of high school, they get a silly, totally-not-serious idea— what if they actually started dating? What a ridiculous thing to say! Unless…?
description.es: Una adorable historia de dos amigos de la infancia que comienzan a salir. Estando en el tercer año, ni un solo momento se debe perder, pues tienen poco tiempo disponible hasta la universidad. Comenzando con un "Creo que deberíamos romper…"
description.fr:
Une adorable histoire de deux amis d'enfance qui commencent à se fréquenter.  
En terminale, aucun moment ne peut être perdu, car ils ont peu de temps restant avant l'université.  
Tout commence par "Yuuki, séparons nous.".
description.pt-br: Uma adorável história de dois amigos de infância que começaram a namorar. Como alunos do terceiro ano, nenhum minuto pode ser disperdiçado, pois eles não tem muito tempo restante até que a faculdade comece. Tudo começou com um "Eu acho que deveríamos terminar."

altTitles.en: Mookhyang: The Origin

description.en:
In this prequel to *Mookhyang: Dark Lady*, we meet Mookhyang in Murim, or the world of martial arts, as a young member of the Demonic Sect. After years of rigorous training, he rises through the ranks and joins an elite squad of first-rate assassins. Despite his impressive achievements, however, he finds himself hungry for more. His obsession for martial arts ultimately leads him down a different path… one that few have ever dared to take. He spends decades learning the way of the sword and cultivating his inner qi, or mana, in hopes of one day reaching a state no warrior of the Demonic Sect has ever reached before—the State of Demon Transcender. Join Mookhyang as he fights powerful masters, takes down evil forces, and pushes himself to the limit... and beyond.

description.ko:
무협계 한 획을 그은 전동조 장편 소설 [묵향]! 
암살자에서 무림 정점에 오르는 묵향의 이야기가 
초대형 웹툰 프로젝트, [묵향 디 오리진]으로 돌아온다!

 수많은 세력이 패권을 다투던 드넓은 중원의 무림. 어릴 적 마교에 납치되어 암살자로 훈련받은 2044호. 고된 훈련 속에서 목숨의 위협을 넘어 치열하게 살아남은 그는 실력을 인정받아 ‘묵향’이란 이름을 얻는다.
 그러나 묵향에게는 언제나 채워지지 않는 갈증이 있었으니, 그것은 바로 검의 길! 암살자로 사는 삶에 만족하지 못하던 그때, 묵향은 스승 ‘환사검 유백’을 만나 인생의 큰 변화를 맞이하는데! 그는 자신이 좇던 탈마의 경지에 올라 무공의 정점에 오를 수 있을까?!

수많은 고수와 격돌하며 궁극의 무를 좇는 묵향!
전설적인 일대기의 서막이 다시 열린다!!

묵향 디 오리진 ⓒ 레드아이스 스튜디오(주), 전동조 / 학산문화사

 이용안내
<묵향 디 오리진>은 전동조 작가님의 소설 <묵향>의 1부의 이야기입니다.
이어지는 <묵향> 2부의 스토리는 <묵향 다크레이디>를 검색하여 이용 부탁드립니다.

description.ru:
Эта история разворачивается в легендарном Муриме, где многочисленные силы борются за превосходство. Номер 2044 ещё в детстве похищает демонический культ, чтобы воспитать из него наёмного убийцу. Но он сумел выжить в тяжёлых тренировках, прошёл через множество испытаний и получил имя “Мукхян” в знак признания своих навыков.

Однако Мукхян на протяжении всей жизни испытывал неудовлетворённую тягу к следованию пути меча! Образ жизни убийцы не смог помочь ему утихомирить то, что у него внутри, но всё меняется, когда он встречает учителя - “Хван Сагом Юпэка”. Сможет ли Мукхян достигнуть уровня Тальма – наивысшей точки мастерства в боевых искусствах?

Мукхяну предстоит сразиться со множеством мастеров и узнать, есть ли предел его силе!

Возвращение легендарного героя!

---
- [Webtoon Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kK5IfJoG05Q)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B5%ED%96%A5-%EB%94%94-%EC%98%A4%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%84/2468)

title.en: My Civil Servant Life Reborn in the Strange World

altTitles.ru: Моя жизнь госслужащего перевоплотилась в боевую гонку

altTitles.en: My Civil Servant Life As a Reincarnated Battle Race

altTitles.es-la: Mi vida como funcionario en un nuevo mundo

description.en:
Den made a promise to his mother on her deathbed that he would find a respectable job. And he almost kept that promise… until he was sent to a new world.

Den is reborn as one of the most powerful magic users and is next in line to be chief of the fearsome Crow Tribe. But Den intends to keep his promise and runs off to the capital to become a civil servant.

With a cast of colorful roommates, a family hunting him down, and a shadowy plot to overthrow the empire, can Den actually achieve his simple life goal?
description.ko:
이세계 최강 전투종족으로 환생해 버린 안전 제일주의 공시생.
하지만 이대로 포기할 순 없지. 내 공무원 생활은 이곳에서 시작이다!

altTitles.ja: 鵺の陰陽師

altTitles.en: Nue's Exorcist

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games. A new modern exorcist saga now begins!
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!

title.en: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: 山田くんとLv999の恋をする

altTitles.en: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999

altTitles.pt-br: Minha História de Amor com Yamada-kun Nível 999

altTitles.fr: My Love Story With Yamada-Kun at LVL 999

description.en:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?

The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.
description.ja: 彼氏をネットゲームで知り合った他の女に取られた茜。ストレス発散に雑魚モンスターを狩っていると、ギルドメンバーのアフロ男・山田に声をかけられる。同じギルメンの誼でフラれたことを愚痴るも、山田は無表情で「興味ない」とそっけない返事。挙句に「狩場を譲れ」と言う山田に「これだからゲームする男なんて！」とキレる茜だったが、好きなゲームをフラれっぱなしでやめられないと一念発起。ネトゲのリアルイベントが開催されることを知った茜は元彼に会えるかも……とお洒落をして会場に乗り込むが、元彼の横には新しい彼女の姿が……。直後、人混みに押され転んでしまった茜に手を差し伸べたのは超イケメンの黒髪男子。しかしそんなイケメンの無愛想な態度と「興味ない」という言葉で頭に浮かんだのはあのアフロ頭のアバター……この眼の前にいるイケメンこそあの山田だった!?　目の前で元カレのイチャコラを見せつけられた茜は山田を居酒屋に連行してヤケ酒に付き合わせる。酔いつぶれた茜が目を覚ますと、そこは見知らぬ場所……山田の部屋だった。もしかして私……!?
description.pt-br: Akane Kinoshita pegou seu namorado tendo um caso com uma garota de um jogo online e ficou completamente arrasada. Ela tenta desestressar matando uns bichos no jogo, e acaba desabafando sobre seu caso com Yamada, um jogador de sua guilda — mas ele responde com um "tô nem aí" curto e grosso. Entretanto, quando Akane decide invadir um encontro offline do jogo para se vingar de seu ex-namorado, ela ouve essas palavras marcantes ao vivo, e seu coração bate mais forte ao conhecer Yamada ao vivo...

description.cs:
Láska je rozprávka. Alebo je? Koktavá dáma Maxi - najstaršia dcéra rodiny Croysovcov, vyrastá zneužívaná svojím otcom je nakoniec donútená vstúpiť do manželstva s rytierom Riftanom. Novomanželia spolu strávia prvú noc, po ktorej okamžite Riftan odchádza na výpravu. O tri roky neskôr sa triumfálne vracia ako slávny rytier. Všetky rozprávky sa končia svadbou a šťastným osudom. Ich láska sa začala svadbou - toto nie je rozprávka. Aké sú Riftanove zámery? Nájde Maxi silu prekonať svoju traumu a nedostatok sebadôvery? Prežije dvojica a nájde lásku napriek všetkým prekážkam?

---
**Note:** Although the novel is R19, the webtoon is R15.

description.en:
The daughter of a duke, the stuttering Maximilian, married a knight of lowly status at her father’s coercion. After their first night, her husband departed for an expedition without another word. He came back three years later, this time as a famous knight in the whole continent. How will Maximilian face him on his return?

"The more I think of you, the more lonely and lonely I become. I don't know why I can't quit even though it's so painful."

---
A flawless love story of the flawed. Stuttering lady Maximilian is forced into a marriage with Sir Riftan, but he leaves on a campaign after their wedding night. Three years later, he triumphantly returns, ready to cherish her. As life with her husband finally begins, she only has one question — does she deserve this love and happiness?

---

A dadogós Maximiliant házasságra kényszerítik Riftannal, aki azonban a nászéjszaka után hadjáratra indul. Három évvel később diadalmasan visszatér, készen arra, hogy újra a lánnyal legyen. Ahogy a várva várt örömteli élet elkezdődik a férjével, a lánynak csak egy kérdése van: Vajon megérdemli-e ezt a szerelmet és boldogságot?

La figlia di un duca, la balbettante e insicura Maxine, sposò un cavaliere di umile condizione per la coercizione del padre. Dopo la loro prima notte, suo marito partì per una spedizione senza aggiungere altro. Tornò tre anni dopo, questa volta come famoso cavaliere in tutto il continente. Come l'affronterà Maxine al suo ritorno? "Più penso a te, più mi sento solo e vuoto. Non so perché, ma non riesco a smettere di pensarti anche se è così doloroso."

Дочь герцога, заика Максимилиана, вышла замуж за рыцаря низкого происхождения по настоянию её отца. После первой же ночи её муж отправился в военный поход, не сказав ни слова на прощание. Три года спустя он возвращается уже как рыцарь, прославленный на весь континент.
Как же теперь Максимилиана встретит его?

“แม็กซิมิเลียน” ลูกสาวของดยุคผู้พูกติดอ่างถูกบังคับให้แต่งงานกับอัศวินที่ไร้ซึ่งยศถาบรรดาศักดิ์ “ริฟแทน” เพียงแค่คืนเดียวหลังวันแต่งงานริฟแทนก็ได้ออกเดินทางเพื่อทำศึกโดยไร้ซึ่งคำบอกกล่าวใด ๆ เมื่อเวลาผ่านไป3ปี เขาได้กลับมาพร้อมกับชัยชนะในฐานะของอัศวินผู้มีชื่อเสียงของอาณาจักร แล้วทีนี้แม็กซิมิเลียนจะเผชิญหน้ากับการกลับมาของเขาได้อย่างไร? "ยิ่งคิดถึงคุณเท่าไหร่ ฉันก็ยิ่งรู้สึกเหงาและเหงามากขึ้นเท่านั้น ฉันไม่รู้ว่าทำไมถึงไม่หยุดคิดเสียที แม้ว่ามันจะเจ็บปวดมาก็ตาม"

description.uk:
Дочка герцога, заїка Максимілліан, через свого батька, насильно вийшла заміж за лицаря низького статусу. Після першої шлюбної ночі, він не проронивши ні слова відправився на експедицію. Після якої повернувся вже відомим на всьому континенті Майстром мечу. Як Максимілліан зустріне його?
«Чим більше я думаю про тебе, тим більш мені стає самотньо. Я не знаю чому я не можу покинути тебе, хоч це і робить мені так боляче.»

description.zh:
天生性格内向、有些口吃的公爵家小姐，在父亲的强迫之下嫁给了平民出身的骑士。大婚之夜过后边奔赴战场的丈夫，3年之后成为了全大陆最知名的骑士，荣归故里。我似乎听到了他的呢喃，“这些年越想起你，越觉得自己很孤独。我想找到，为何如此痛苦却始终对你放心不下的原因。”

title.en: Mainichi Ie ni Kuru Gal ga Kyorikan Zero Demo Yasashiku nai

altTitles.ja: 毎日家に来るギャルが距離感ゼロでも優しくない

altTitles.ja-ro: Mainichi Ie ni Kuru Gyaru ga Kyorikan Zero Demo Yasashiku nai

altTitles.en: The Gal Who Comes to My House Every Day Has Zero Boundaries but Isn't Kind

description.en:
Class queen Manami Fuwa has been gaining weight lately. 

To make matters worse, a rival girl is taunting her in class, calling her a "muscle ball with money". 

When Taichi Utsuki can't contain his thoughts about her weight, he's forced to accompany Fuwa on her diet! 

A romantic comedy of dieting with a violent, irrational, selfish girl with no sense of emotional distance begins.
description.pt-br: A rainha da classe, Manami Fuwa, tem ganhado peso ultimamente. Para piorar as coisas, uma garota rival está zombando dela na sala de aula, chamando-a de "bola de músculo com dinheiro". Quando Taichi Utsuki não consegue conter seus pensamentos sobre o peso dela, ele é obrigado a acompanhar Fuwa em sua dieta! Uma comédia romântica sobre fazer dieta com uma garota violenta, irracional, egoísta e sem noção de distância emocional começa.

altTitles.en: Chillin’ in Another World with Level 2 Super Cheat Powers

altTitles.zh: 勇者候补的悠闲的异世界生活

altTitles.uk: Спокійне життя колишнього висуванця в герої, котрий виявився читером із 2 рівня

altTitles.ko: LV2부터 치트였던 전직 용사후보의 유유자적 이세계 라이프

description.en: Banaza, who was summoned to the magic kingdom of Cryroad as a Hero candidate, was disqualified as a Hero because of his ordinary abilities. He was supposed to be returned to his original world, but due to the magical kingdom's mistake, he became unable to return to his original world. However, the moment he reached Level 2, he acquired every single possible skill and kind of magic, turning him into a super cheat with infinite skills! Despite this, he takes Fenris of the demons as his wife, and fully enjoys his newly-married life with an easygoing smile. He changes his name to Fulio and tries to lead his life quietly, but things are a bit chaotic with the likes of a pet saber, four freeloading female knights, a Majin, and even an ex-Demon Lord. However, even with all of this chaos, he still manages to enjoy his life peacefully.
description.fr: Un jour, Banaza a été invoqué dans un autre monde, le Royaume magique de Cryroad en tant que candidat Héroïque. Malheureusement, Banaza fût disqualifié des candidats Héroïque car ces statistiques étaient très basique. Alors, le Royaume décida de l'emmener loin du château car il était inutile. Mais alors qu'il se retrouva tout seul, un ennemi apparu devant lui, avec quelques difficultés, il réussit à vaincre l'ennemi, c'est alors qu'il monta de niveau, mais pas tout à fait normalement…
description.ja: 栄えある勇者候補として異世界に召喚された青年バナザは、能力値の低さから勇者失格の烙印を押され国外追放処分となる。なんとか生き延びるべくモンスターを倒すと、レベルが２に上がり彼のステータスが見慣れない「∞」の記号に変わっていた……。突然のステータス変化に戸惑いながらもマイペースに生きていくことを決意するが、魔族の娘フェンリースと運命的な出会いを果たし――!?
description.ru:
Баназа был призван в волшебное королевство Крайроуд в качестве кандидата в герои, но на нём поставили крест, так как тот имел навыки обычного гражданина. Изначально он хотел вернуться в свой мир, но из-за ошибки представителей королевства не смог этого сделать и был вынужден остаться жить в другом мире. Сменив имя на Фурио, он решил жить в своё удовольствие. И вот так, прогуливаясь по новому для себя миру, он победил слизь, получил второй уровень и, взглянув после этого на характеристики, увидел, что все они имеют значение «∞». С этого и начинается его непринуждённая жизнь в другом мире.

---

(source: readmanga)
description.uk: Баназу, звичайного торговця, викликають до іншого світу і нарікають Героєм. Проте увагою він був оточений зовсім недовго - як тільки виявилось, що його здібності не відрізняються від здібностей пересічної людини, бідолаху виставили за двері без можливості повернутись додому. Так і почалось його спокійне життя у зовсім чужому світі, але як тільки він досягнув 2 рівня...
description.pt-br:
Banaza foi invocado ao reino mágico de Cryroad como candidato a herói. No entanto, por ter especificações como as de uma pessoa comum, ele foi desqualificado e não pôde voltar ao seu mundo devido a um erro das pessoas que o invocaram. Sendo apenas nível 2, Banaza obterá forças além de sua compreensão.  


---

title.en: My Dark Fiancé Is Interfering With My Flowery Path

altTitles.es-la: Mi prometido villano está interfiriendo con mi camino florido

description.en:
A fake saint born from a misinterpretation of trust. A swindler who deceived the empire. Abandoned by her family, she envied the real saint and committed all sorts of evil deeds before dying as a villain.

That was my role in the original work.

After learning that I was reincarnated into a book, I made up my mind. I can’t live in this country anymore; it’s too filthy and dangerous. The only solution is exile!

In order to go into exile, I had to live innocently without any criminal charges. I aimed for a smooth path, just living as a good person. Without killing anyone, without envying anyone.

But something is strange.

Despite not doing anything like that this time, news of accidents involving extras who used to mock me in the original work keeps coming in every day.

description.en:
Satou Ryouta who died from overworking at a black company was reincarnated to another world. Although Ryouta was alive, he is now burdened with the inconvenience that his level is fixed to 1 in this new world.

Although he wasn’t able to raise his level, he had a unique skill that can create a cheat-like item that shouldn’t exist in the world from a monster.

He got to know about his status and MAX them with the help of ability-up items. He gathered a number of weapons and items that can only be used by himself, allowing him to be level 1 but yet, having the strongest equipment.
description.pt-br: Ryota Sato, um assalariado que trabalha para uma empresa exploradora, vai parar de repente em uma masmorra estranha, num mundo onde monstros derrotados soltam loots de todos os tipos. Com a ajuda de uma jovem chamada Emily, ele lê seus próprios atributos, e descobre que todos os seus atributos físicos e mágicos são nota F (a pior!). Pra piorar, seu nível está travado no 1 (o mais baixo!). Quando Ryota cai em desespero, ele percebe ele tem uma "Habilidade de Drop: S Geral", a habilidade mais poderosa que existe! Será que Ryota vai conseguir sobreviver neste mundo bizarro?

description.en:
Fildo is suddenly fired from "Light of Glory," the top guild in the country and a black guild. Although Fildo was mercilessly expelled from the guild, his experience value increased remarkably due to the effect of the Point Gifter "Experience Distributor" skill, and he became the most powerful man on the continent. On the other hand, "Light of Glory" lost a great deal of experience and faced a crisis of collapse.
  
Fighting with former guild members, interacting with beautiful elf sisters, defeating dragons, etc... Awakened with the strongest all-around skills, Fildo's otherworldly cheat tale of free-spirited and peerless warriors is about to begin!!!
description.ja: 国内トップギルド、そしてブラックギルドであった『栄光の光』から突然のクビ宣告を受けるフィルド。 無慈悲にもギルドを追放されてしまったフィルドだったが、ポイントギフター《経験値分配能力者》のスキルの効果で自身の経験値が驚くほどの上昇を見せ、大陸随一の実力者に成り上がる。 一方『栄光の光』は経験値を大幅に失い崩壊の危機に直面していくのであった――。 元ギルドメンバーとの闘い・美しきエルフ姉妹との交流・ドラゴン討伐 etc… 万能最強スキルで覚醒し、自由気ままに無双するフィルドの異世界チート譚が幕を開ける!!!

description.de:
Niemand in Oliva Florence’ Leben — einschließlich ihres eigenen Ehemanns — gab ihr die Wärme, nach die sie sich immer sehnte, weswegen sie ihr Leben allein lebte und dadurch zu einer starken, unabhängigen Frau wurde. Als sie eines Morgens, zwei Jahrzehnte vor Beginn ihrer arrangierten und unglücklichen Ehe mit dem Herzog Herr James Parnell, aufwacht und realisiert, dass sie in der Zeit zurückgereist ist, beschließt sie, ihr Leben radikal umzukremplen. Sie heckt einen Plan aus, um ihre Ehe zu annullieren und stattdessen den Herzog Ian Tyrone zu heiraten, der aufgrund seines bekannten Desinteresses an Frauen als *impotent* gilt. Vielleicht würde jenes Desinteresse an Frauen Olivia ein entspanntes Leben als Ehefrau ermöglichen, ohne den Druck, Kinder kriegen oder andere Dinge tun zu müssen. Zumindest erhofft sie sich das. Doch Moment… Der Herzog, der dafür bekannt sein soll, „keinen hochzukriegen,“ entpuppt sich im Schlafzimmer als absoluter Hengst. Worauf hat sich Olivia da bloß eingelassen?

---

description.en:
Not a single soul in Olivia Florence's life, including her own husband, provided the warmth that she craved, and she lived her life alone, growing strong. Waking up two decades earlier right after her regretful arranged marriage to the Duke, Lord James Parnell, she plans to live a different life.

She hatches a plan to annul her marriage remarry the Duke, Ian Tyrone, infamous for being *impotent* for never showing any interest in the ladies. Maybe his disinterest in women would allow Olivia to comfortably live as his wife, unburdened by childbirth and free of any other pressures in life.

But wait, the Duke who seemingly "couldn't get it up" turns out to be a complete stud at in the bedroom. What has Olivia gotten herself into?

---
Olivia, celebrating her second chance at life, decides to get away from her first husband, who has high libido. So she proposed marriage to Duke Tyrone, who is known for his incompetence, but when I got married, this man was a skillful man and totally not defective.

"This is fraud! This marriage is a fraud!"

Olivia, who is now depressed because of her desperate second husband putting moves on her, will she be happy in her second life?

---

description.fr:
Pas une seule âme dans la vie d'Olivia Florence, y compris son propre mari, ne lui a procuré le bien-être dont elle avai besion, et elle a vécu sa vie seule, en devenant de plus en plus forte chaque jour. Se réveillant deux décennies plus tôt, tout juste après son regrettable mariage arrangé avec le duc, Seigneur James Parnell, elle projette de vivre une vie différente. Elle élabore un plan pour annuler son mariage et se remarier avec un autre duc, Ian Tyrone, tristement célèbre pour être «*impussant*» et n'avoir jamais montré le moindre intérêt pour les femmes. Peut-être que cette indifférence permettrait à Olivia de vivre confortablement en tant qu’épouse, sans être accablée par les grossesses et libre de toute autre pression dans la vie. Out mais, le duc qui apparemment «ne pouvait pas avoir d'érection» s'avère être un vrai étalon au lit. Dans quoi Oliva s'est-elle embarquée?

---

description.ja:
「不能男と聞いていたのに…？」
人生2回目を迎えた主人公オリビア。 今生は、代理親孝行に嫁入り暮らしをさせながら、性欲まで旺盛な夫から抜け出すことを決心する。 
そして不能と噂されているタイロン公爵に結婚を提案したが、結婚してみるとこの男、不能どころかとても上手な絶倫男だった……!!
「これは詐欺よ、私は結婚詐欺にあったの！」
2番目の絶倫夫に今日も憂鬱なオリビア。果たして2回目の人生では幸せになれるだろうか。

description.ko:
'대국민 고자라더니…?!'

인생 2회차를 맞은 주인공 올리비아.
이번 생엔 대리 효도에 시집살이를 시키면서 성욕까지 왕성한 남편에게서 벗어나기로 마음 먹는다.
그래서 불능으로 소문난 타이론 공작에게 결혼을 제안했는데,
결혼하고 보니 이 남자, 대국민 고자는 커녕 세상 능숙한 절륜남이었다…! 

'이건 사기야, 난 사기 결혼을 당한 거라고!' 

절륜한 두 번째 남편 때문에 오늘도 우울한 올리비아, 2회차 인생에서는 과연 행복해질 수 있을까?

description.ru:
Сегодня мне исполнилось 40 лет. После дня, как я готовилась по случаю дня рождения, я легла спать, но на следующий день проснулась молодой и в старой коморке. Услышав оскорбления от свекрови и ее сестер, только тогда я поняла, что я вернулась на двадцать лет назад. Чтобы не прожить свою жизнь, как и раньше, где я не видела и лица своего первого мужа. Чтобы все самые лучшие годы жизни не улетели в мусорное ведро, я решила изменить свою жизнь и выйти замуж за герцога Яна Терона.

description.vi:
Olivia đã sống một cuộc đời bất hạnh với người chồng lạnh nhạt và 3 bà mẹ chồng cay nghiệt. Tỉnh lại sau một đêm, Olivia nhận ra mình đã quay về tuổi 20, khi cô vừa về nhà người chồng đầu tiên và vẫn còn có thể vô hiệu hóa cuộc hôn nhân này. Olivia quyết tâm sẽ không cam chịu nhẫn nhục và chôn vùi cuộc đời mình ở chốn địa ngục kia như kiếp trước nữa. Cô cầu hôn Công tước Tyron với quyết tâm bắt đầu một cuộc đời mới. Công tước Tyron vừa giàu có vừa đẹp trai nhưng lại nổi tiếng khắp đế quốc với tin đồn bị "bất lực". Liệu người chồng thứ hai này có đem lại hạnh phúc như Olivia mong muốn không?

title.en: Level 0 Demon King Becomes an Adventurer in Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: Level 0 no Maou-sama, Isekai de Boukensha wo Hajimemasu

altTitles.en: Level 0 Evil King Become the Adventurer in the New World

altTitles.ja: レベル０の魔王様、異世界で冒険者を始めます

description.en:
Meet the Evil King Valt, ruler of the Continent of Darkness. After being defeated by a group of heroes, he was reborn as a human, with his powers intact!  
  
"I'll start over in this world. And this time the whole world will be mine!"  
  
Valt garners the attention of the elite adventurer Iris. With Iris as his guardian, he enrolls at the Royal Adventurer Training School and immediately surpasses his seniors with his abnormal power! In an unprecedented move, this maverick is designated "level 0." He goes on to employ his talents as an Evil King to great effect, dominating the new world he finds himself in…

title.en: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!

altTitles.zh: 身为恶役女配的我养成病娇女主很正常吧？！

altTitles.pt-br: Como A Vilã, Criar Uma Protagonista Yandere É Normal, Não É?!

altTitles.zh-ro: Shen Wei E Yi Nv Pei De Wo Yang Cheng Bìng Jiao Nv Zhu Hen Zheng Chang Ba?!

description.en:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
description.zh: 姜央是一名为了游戏新作采风不幸摔下悬崖穿越到修真世界的游戏主美，为了回到原本的世界，姜央努力修炼，终于要飞升成神回到原本的世界，结果因为一条神秘的因果线，被强制牵引到了一个魔法世界中（还是个乙女游戏，游戏刚开始），捡到了初入魔法校园就被恶役女二欺负的的游戏女主。 姜央这时反应过来，这不就是当初让自己穿越的那个倒霉换皮游戏吗？而自己的因果线就连接在了游戏女主星露的身上。姜央以为只要跟着游戏通关，自己就能回到最初的现实世界，但是随着游戏发展，姜央再次回想起了煞笔策划写的沙雕剧情，看着星露受苦，具有强烈责任心和道德感的姜央选择对星露出手相助，不仅要帮对方清理花心皇子那些烂桃花，还传授修真技巧以防对方被其他学生霸凌，甚至有时还得搭上自己的身子！！随着姜央和星露的交往越来越密切，姜央发现自己在星露身上的因果线没有自己想象中那么简单……
description.pt-br:
Jiang Yang é a diretora de designe de arte de um jogo, ao coletar referências para uma nova produção, cai de um penhasco e acaba atravessando para um mundo de cultivo. Para voltar ao seu mundo original, Jiang Yang se dedica ao cultivo e finalmente está prestes a ascender como uma divindade para retornar. No entanto, devido a uma misteriosa linha do destino, ela é forçada a ser puxada para um mundo de magia (que também é um jogo otome, e o jogo acabou de começar). Nesse novo mundo, ela encontra a protagonista do jogo, Xing Lu, sendo intimidada pela vilã secundária logo no início da academia de magia.

Jiang Yang percebe que este é o jogo problemático que a fez atravessar os mundos originalmente. Sua linha do destino está ligada a Xing Lu, a protagonista do jogo. Jiang Yang acredita que, seguindo a história do jogo até o fim, ela poderá retornar ao seu mundo real. No entanto, conforme o jogo se desenvolve, Jiang Yang relembra as tramas ridículas escritas pelo roteirista idiota do jogo. Vendo o sofrimento de Xing Lu, a fortemente responsável e moralmente íntegra Jiang Yang decide ajudar Xing Lu. Ela não apenas ajuda a livrar Xing Lu dos pretendentes indesejados, incluindo o príncipe mulherengo, mas também lhe ensina técnicas de cultivo para que ela possa se defender dos outros estudantes. Às vezes, isso até envolve sacrificar-se fisicamente! 

À medida que Jiang Yang e Xing Lu se tornam mais próximas, Jiang Yang descobre que sua linha do destino com Xing Lu é mais complexa do que ela imaginava...

title.en: The Vampire Dies in No Time

altTitles.en: The Vampire Dies In No Time.
The Vampire Dies Now

altTitles.ja: 吸血鬼すぐ死ぬ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyuuketsuki Sugu Shinu

description.en:
Vampires are said to have many weaknesses to balance out their incredible powers. The vampire lord Draluc just so happens to be weak to... everything. He dies, disintegrating into a pile of sand, at the slightest shock.

After a disastrous encounter with the vampire hunter (and author) Ronaldo leaves Draluc’s castle destroyed, Draluc decides to pack up his remaining belongings and adorable armadillo familiar John and move into Ronaldo’s office (despite the hunter’s protests). Chaos ensues as this unlikely duo is forced to work together while fending off perverted vampires, Ronaldo's terrifying editor, Draluc’s eccentric family, and more—with Draluc dying continuously along the way.
  
[Anime Adaptation Announcement](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-06/itaru-bonnoki-the-vampire-dies-in-no-time-manga-gets-anime/.159208)

altTitles.en: In/Spectre

altTitles.ja: 虚構推理

description.en:
Meet the cute, smug, cane-wielding 17-year-old Iwanaga Kotoko as she (very) aggressively tries to woo the older Sakuragawa Kurou and act as a mediator/problem-solver for the supernatural world. But why is she so fascinated with Sakuragawa Kurou? The truth is…

- [Alternative English Translation: INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/1122-in-spectre)
description.it: Quando era ancora piccola, Kotoko è stata rapita dagli yokai. Questi yokai l'hanno resa una potente intermediaria tra gli spiriti e il mondo degli umani, ma tale potere ha un prezzo: un occhio e una gamba. Ora, anni dopo, fa attenzione agli yokai pericolosi mentre inizia a provare qualcosa per un giovane uomo di nome Kuro. Lui è sorpreso quando Kotoko gli chiede di fare squadra per affrontare uno yokai rinnegato, per preservare la sottile linea tra realtà e sovrannaturale.
description.ja: 怪異になってしまった一人の少女と、怪異にさえ恐れられる一人の男が出会った時、生まれるものは――!?
description.ru: После контакта с духами-ёкаями Котоко и Куро обрели уникальные сверхчеловеческие силы. Но для этого Котоко пришлось отказаться от глаза и ноги, а личная жизнь Куро лежит в руинах. Поэтому, когда Котоко предлагает ему объединиться для борьбы с отступниками из мира духов, у Куро не остаётся выбора, однако у Котоко могут быть и скрытые мотивы…

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

description.en: Russel is a [saint] who was an expert in recovery magic. he was in a group with his childhood friends until the rest of the members learned recovery magic. Branded unnecessary and expelled from his group of friends, he meets a mysterious beauty named Sybilla. His infinite magical potential, combined with her guidance now allow him to reach heights once deemed impossible!

altTitles.en: The Female Lead Has an Affair With My Fiancé
The Heroine Had an Affair With My Fiancé

description.en:
She became an extra who died because of her rubbish fiancé. She succeeded in becoming best friends with the heroine in order to twist the original plot.

"I'm sorry, Ciel. But we're still friends, right?"

The heroine had an affair with my fiancé. Yeah, go ahead and take that trash.

"Would you like to have a revenge affair with someone who's been the victim of an affair, Your Highness?"

'Cause I decided to have the Male Lead. Since I've broken my engagement, I can start getting the Male Lead after getting out of the original story and decided to enjoy a happy life. After a while, rumors have spread that I was the Crown's Prince lover and was raking in money. And there's also the news that the two had broken up.

"Ciel, I was wrong. Can we still be friends?"

"Ciel… I was foolish. You are the only one that I love. You love me too, right? So let's start over."

What? Are they both out of their minds? Throwing their hands away, I raised the corners of my lips.

"Don't make me laugh. Get out of here."

altTitles.ja: 黒鉄の魔法使い

description.en:
A carefree smile on her face, she delivers punishing blows with her fists! The craziest, new heroine from another world makes her entrance  
  
Delice Fahrenheit who'd been transported from another world and has been widely-known for being a prominent wizard, has an apprentice who'd also been transported from another world named Haruna Katsuragi. Her status was unprecedentedly low despite being from another world. However, through her training with Delice, her hidden talents were revealed. The isekai-fantasy, master-apprentice story for revenge(?) begins.  
  
WN Raw: <https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1716dz/>

Woo Ji-Taek, chairman of the Samjo Group, one of Korea's leading conglomerates, dies of a stroke while having sex. So Heon, his apparent lover who was with him at the time, is investigated by the police.

After a while, Seo Ho, the president of the agency where he works, calls So Heon and offers him a deal... No, he threatens him so that he cannot refuse. Seo Ho shows him a (sex) video of that day, in which So Heon is the main protagonist... Because of this video, Chairman Woo Ji-Taek's new will, and Chairman Seo Ho, So Heon gets caught in the conflicts for the control of the Samjo Group. His life is in danger.

But So Heon and Seo Ho, despite their mutual mistrust, begin to have mixed feelings as they spend more time together...

altTitles.ko: 쿠보 양은 나를 내버려 두지 않아

altTitles.en: Kubo-san Doesn't Leave Me Be (a Mob)

altTitles.ja-ro: Kubo-san wa Boku (Mobu) wo Yurusanai

altTitles.it: Kubo non mi permette di essere invisibile

description.en:
First year high schooler Junta Shiraishi is a mob character who goes unnoticed even when he's standing right next to you. But his classmate, "heroine-level beauty" Kubo, always notices him and is there to tease him. Anyone can become special to someone, but it might be a little too early to call these feelings "love."

Perhaps this story is still two-steps from being a romantic comedy! A sweet comedy where a background character becomes visible!
description.es: Shiraishi Junta es un muchacho simplón que le faltan dos pelos para ser invisible ante sus compañeros de clase; en otras palabras, un personaje de fondo. Esto da entrada a Kubo, su bella vecina de asiento que siempre le da atención y juguetea experimentando con él para determinar qué tan "invisible" él es de hecho… y entonces, ella se declara a sí misma su "heroína"!!!
description.id:
Junta Shiraishi, siswa kelsa 1 SMA, adalah seorang cowok 'figuran' yang tak terasa kehadirannya. Biarpun duduk di sebelah orang, orang itu tidak menyadari kehadirannya, bahkan meskipun ikut terfoto dalam foto bersama, fotonya dibuatkan gambar wajah karena dikira absen. Hanya Kubo-san, cewek cantik teman sekelasnya yang 'level heroine', yang dapat menemukannya dengan matanya yang tajam, dan setiap hari mengusilinya.

Siapa pun bisa menjadi spesial bagi seseorang. Tapi, untuk sampai pada yang namanya 'cinta', perasaan kedua orang itu masih sedikit polos.
description.ru: Шираиши-кун - обычный школьник, только вот он очень неприметный, настолько, что даже одноклассники и учителя не замечают его. Ещё чуть-чуть и он был бы совсем невидимым. Другими словам "моб". В свою очередь, Кубо-сан - его прекрасная соседка по парте, только она постоянно замечает его. Кубо-сан игриво экспериментирует с Шираиши, чтобы оценить - насколько же он "неприметный" на самом деле… А потом объявляет себя его "героиней"!!!
description.pt-br: Estudante do Ensino Médio, Junta Shiraishi passa despercebido por todos, até mesmo quando ele está parado bem ali. No entanto, Kubo-san, a garota mais bonita de sua classe, parece encontrá-lo não importa onde esteja?!

Amano Megumi is FULL of Openings!
Amano Megumi is Wide Open!

altTitles.ja: 天野めぐみはスキだらけ!

description.en: Shindo Manabu is a student at a very prestigious high school whose goal is to get into Tokyo University. He studies constantly and tries to never lose sight of that goal. That is until his childhood friend, Amano Megumi, who goes to the same school starts to distract him. He originally only remembered her as the tomboy she was as a kid, until he notices how "developed" she has become. As these two get closer to each other, hilarity often ensues and subsequently, Manabu becomes more and more distracted from his goal of getting into Tokyo U.
description.pt-br: Shindo Manabu é um estudante de uma escola de ensino médio muito prestigiada cujo objetivo é entrar na Universidade de Tóquio. Ele estuda constantemente e tenta nunca perder de vista este objetivo. Isso até que sua amiga de infância, Amano Megumi, que frequenta a mesma escola, começa a distraí-lo. Ele originalmente só se lembrava dela como a moleca que ela era quando criança, até perceber o quão “desenvolvida” ela se tornou. À medida que esses dois se aproximam, a hilaridade geralmente acontece e, posteriormente, Manabu se torna cada vez mais distraído de seu objetivo de entrar na Universidade de Tóquio.

description.en: The story centers around a main character who was raised as a butler from his family's trade, and who one day meets a rich young lady who cannot even change her own clothes, let alone know what to do in the outside world.
description.pt: A história se concentra em um personagem principal que foi criado como mordomo do comércio de sua família e que, um dia, conhece um jovem rica que nem sequer consegue trocar sua própria roupa e, muito menos, saber o que fazer no mundo exterior.
description.es-la: La historia se centra en un personaje principal que fue criado como un mayordomo por la ocupación de su familia, y que un día conoce a una joven rica que no puede siquiera cambiarse la ropa por su propia cuenta, y mucho menos, saber qué hacer en el mundo exterior.
description.pt-br: A história se concentra em um personagem principal que tem uma personalidade intrometida cujo pai é um mordomo e cuja mãe é uma criada e que, um dia, conhece uma jovem rica que nem sequer consegue trocar sua própria roupa e, muito menos, saber o que fazer no mundo exterior

description.en: Crest was born as the fifth son of a duke. However, as the fifth son, he was in no position to talk. His childhood friend and also his fiancée, Ellis, treated him just like a slave. And on Crest's coming-of-age ceremony, he received a skill called "Gacha." Yet, he wasn't able to learn how to use it and was banished away from his home. Banished into the forest full of monsters, Crest began to understand the power "Gacha." And then, Crest made up his mind. He will definitely survive and get back on his feet.

altTitles.en: My Husband Hates Me, But He Lost His Memories

description.en: In a politically arranged marriage devoid of love, Lily is wed to Theodore, the head of a rival family. Theodore loathes the union, but little does he know that Lily despises her own family as much as he does. Living a quiet life, she counts the days until their inevitable divorce. Then fate intervenes—a sudden accident erases Theodore’s memories of her, transforming his coldness into unexpected affection. Can Lily trust this dramatic shift, or must she guard her heart to avoid future heartbreak?

Ruby never expected to get transported into the world of a novel… least of all a spicy boys’ love novel!

When such a thing happens, what’s a girl to do?

Make the most of it by becoming a successful businesswoman running a luxury inn, of course!

The money and power is one thing, but the chance to see and interact with her favorite hunky guys from the story is an added bonus.

There’s only one problem, and that’s the mysterious, scheming villain.

What was once just some brooding eye-candy is now a very real threat to Ruby’s life.

Will Ruby be able to out-maneuver this scheming visitor, or is this story doomed to end in tragedy?

altTitles.ru: Маг освоит магию эффективней в своей второй жизни

description.en: Zeff Einstein spent his whole life mastering red magic and was finally recognized for it, yet a new spell that was soon created revealed that his talent for red magic was his lowest. Bitter at the thought of all his wasted effort, he creates a spell to send his old self back in time to his younger body and together with the determined "genius" mage Milly and the handsome swordswoman Claude, he intends to master magic more efficiently this time.
description.pt-br: Zeff Einstein passou a vida toda a masterizar a Red Magic, e finalmente conseguiu ser reconhecido por isso, mas uma nova magia que foi criada revelou que o seu talento para com red magic era o mais baixo possível. Amargurado por todos os seus esforços terem sido gastos em vão, ele criou um spell que o mandava a sua personalidade de agora para o seu corpo jovem de antigamente, junto com a maga “gênio” Milly e a linda espadachim Claude, ele pretende masterizar a sua magia de forma mais eficaz dessa vez.

description.en:
There is a family, who for generations, were rumored to be monsters. The lord of the Halstead castle, Erden. He adorns a mask to hide his scary face. Leticia, who was sent to marry Lord Halstead in place of her sisters, began to be referred to as 'the woman who married the monster' and was pitied by others. but there is a secret that they don't know.  
  
"I'm always grateful to you, wife. You're so kind to the unsightly me…"  
  
"Well, since I'm Erden's wife."  
  
"I need to divorce you soon so you won't be troubled by such things anymore… I'm sorry but I lost the divorce papers."  
  
Well of course, that's because I burnt them.  
  
"So I need more time… I think it'll take more time."  
  
I need to spread more scary rumors about the north to the lawyers. I am definitely not divorcing such a handsome husband!!!

description.en:
What if your life is just like playing a game? What if you can upgrade your status and gain more levels? A fantasy world is coming right at you!  
  
Han Jee-Han, a normal high school student, suddenly develops a special power where his entire world is shifted into a game-like setting. He can see the power levels of people, look at the stats of a seemingly normal item, get abilities, and even level up! Follow Han Jee-Han as he discovers how to use this power, and maybe even where it came from.
description.fr:
Et si votre vie ressemblait à un jeu vidéo et si vous pouviez améliorer vos stats et gagner plus de niveaux ?

description.ru:
Обычным дням школьной жизни пришёл конец с тех пор, как, из-за сильных пристрастий к MMORPG и другим компьютерным играм, обычный игроман и посредственный ученик Хан Чжи Хан был одарён «богиней Геей» сверхъестественным даром под ироничным названием «Игрок». Теперь он стал игровым персонажем в реальной жизни и может прокачивать уровень, тем самым повышая свои навыки так, как сам того желает. Только из-за этого «дара свыше» он оказался втянут в Бездну, мир полный сверхъестественных созданий и опасностей, которые будут преследовать его. По этой причине герой должен максимально быстро качать свой уровень и изучать новые способности, чтобы противостоять тем, кто попытается ему навредить, так как в Бездне это обычное явление. Но, к счастью, его лучший друг уже давно является частью Бездны и всеми силами помогает ему не умереть раньше времени. А вот что ждёт героя впереди, к чему приведёт его судьба и воля Геи, какова будет его роль в Бездне и чего он сможет добиться в познании своих сил, мы увидим в его дальнейших приключениях.

description.zh-hk:
平凡的高中生韓志漢從某個瞬間開始像是在玩線上角色扮演遊戲一樣看得見周圍每個人的頭頂上都標記著的特技和等級，甚至連幫忙跑腿的工作也變成像在遊戲中執行任務的模式，然後突然間他真的像從遊戲裡走出來的人一樣擁有了神奇的超能力并且能夠和其他玩家戰鬥，他的人生開始變成了一場遊戲。 日本的《刀劍神域》將原本電腦遊戲中的規則套入了玩家們的現實生活中，而《遊俠》這部作品則將主角原本平凡無奇的人生變得像遊戲一樣夢幻神奇，主角擁有了可以看到其他人的能力值和等級的能力後，他開始慢慢地開發自己的技能及等級，過程中也享受到彷彿在遊戲裡『練功』的樂趣。
